analysis.description:
Crowdsale.transferManually (/unique_contracts/0x0bee1b7287969e1e8afb50eb587e93217ffab3a3.sol#204-213) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token_reward.transfer(to_address,_tokens) (/unique_contracts/0x0bee1b7287969e1e8afb50eb587e93217ffab3a3.sol#211)

Crowdsale.transferIfTokenAvailable (/unique_contracts/0x0bee1b7287969e1e8afb50eb587e93217ffab3a3.sol#215-289) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token_reward.transfer(_beneficiary,total_token_to_transfer) (/unique_contracts/0x0bee1b7287969e1e8afb50eb587e93217ffab3a3.sol#281-285)

Crowdsale.transferBack (/unique_contracts/0x0bee1b7287969e1e8afb50eb587e93217ffab3a3.sol#317-321) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token_reward.transfer(to_address,tokens) (/unique_contracts/0x0bee1b7287969e1e8afb50eb587e93217ffab3a3.sol)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_contracts/0x0bee1b7287969e1e8afb50eb587e93217ffab3a3.sol#292-308):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(transferIfTokenAvailable(tokens,weiAmount,beneficiary)) (/unique_contracts/0x0bee1b7287969e1e8afb50eb587e93217ffab3a3.sol#302-306)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- weiRaised (/unique_contracts/0x0bee1b7287969e1e8afb50eb587e93217ffab3a3.sol#306-307)

Crowdsale.end_Time should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x0bee1b7287969e1e8afb50eb587e93217ffab3a3.sol#89)
Crowdsale.phase_1_bonus should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x0bee1b7287969e1e8afb50eb587e93217ffab3a3.sol#97-98)
Crowdsale.phase_2_bonus should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x0bee1b7287969e1e8afb50eb587e93217ffab3a3.sol#98-99)

Crowdsale.token_price should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x0bee1b7287969e1e8afb50eb587e93217ffab3a3.sol#104-106)
